subject: Kayaks
Canoes and Canoeing
Canoe-Kayak
Blindness
Athletics and Sports
Rivers
lead_paragraph: Erik Weihenmayer, a blind adventurer, will attempt to kayak the Colorado River through the Grand Canyon next year. He trains at the U.S. National Whitewater Center in Charlotte, N.C.
snippet: Erik Weihenmayer, a blind adventurer, will attempt to kayak the Colorado River through the Grand Canyon next year. He trains at the U.S. National Whitewater Center in Charlotte, N.C.
